TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPersonClient implements class Microsoft.HealthVault.Clients.IClient

Docs.summary: An interface for the HealthVault person client. Used to access information and records associated with the currently authenticated user.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class Microsoft.HealthVault.Person.ApplicationSettings> GetApplicationSettingsAsync() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the application settings for the current application and person.
Docs.returns: The complete set application settings including the XML settings, selected record ID, etc.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection`1<class Microsoft.HealthVault.Person.PersonInfo>> GetAuthorizedPeopleAsync() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets information about people authorized for an application.
Docs.returns: Collection of objects representing people authorized for the application.
Docs.exception: The HealthVault service returned an error.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class Microsoft.HealthVault.Record.HealthRecordInfo>> GetAuthorizedRecordsAsync(class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<valuetype System.Guid> recordIds) cil managed

Docs.param: The unique identifiers for the records to retrieve.
Docs.summary: Gets the for the records identified by the specified .
Docs.returns: A collection of the records matching the specified record identifiers and authorized for the authenticated person.
Docs.remarks: This method is useful in cases where the application is storing record identifiers and needs access to the functionality provided by the object model.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class Microsoft.HealthVault.Person.PersonInfo> GetPersonInfoAsync() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the information about the person specified.
Docs.returns: Information about the person's HealthVault account.
Docs.remarks: This method always calls the HealthVault service to get the latest information. It is recommended that the calling application cache the return value and only call this method again if it needs to refresh the cache.
Docs.exception: The HealthVault service returned an error.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task SetApplicationSettingsAsync(string requestParameters) cil managed

Docs.summary: Sets the application settings for the current application and person.
Docs.remarks: This may be null if no application settings have been stored for the application or user.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task SetApplicationSettingsAsync(class System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable applicationSettings) cil managed

Docs.summary: Sets the application settings for the current application and person.
Docs.remarks: This may be null if no application settings have been stored for the application or user.
